content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Managing your small business in Malvern is as exciting as it is fulfilling. Imagine expanding your business without the additional overhead, rental and utility costs. How? By starting your own website! You won’t just cater to customers from Malvern, or even Melbourne, but globally! Confetti Design can make that happen by providing affordable web design services, creating the best website for your Malvern business.

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Malvern

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564475319672{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We will help you build your e-commerce website from ground up. Our retail and e-commerce experience is invaluable in helping your business be a success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563761736167{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

3 Types of website visitors

[vc_column_text]

Every website has their own character and message, and this depends on the audience they were built for. One of Confetti Design’s unique web design and development service is that we help you uncover the customer profiles of your business in Malvern and create your website accordingly. Although generally, these customers still behave differently despite their common interests.

Confetti Design compiled the different types of website visitors so that you’d know exactly how to deal with them in the future.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

In Confetti Design, we conceptualise your website based from the results of our Clarity Process. But we don’t only create your website afterwards—we also think about how your customers think. We take care of every aspect of your website, from design to Search Engine Optimisation, to recommendations on how you’ll market your website in social media. Give us a call today so that we can get started!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608564696{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564475578382{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Just surfing

When we find an interesting product or service that is not really something that we immediately need or is out of our budget range, we usually browse online just to get educated about the product or service. Probably we saw an advertisement or an Instagram image while browsing, and just got curious about the ad. This is how surfers behave. What they immediately look for are more specific information, location, and price. It is important that your business website in Malvern and your mobile website design provides as much education about your product as you can give.

Confetti Design helps you cater to the surfer type of visitors by keeping them engaged with the topic (your product or service) that they’re already interested in. From design to content to call to action buttons, we tailor fit each component for your website’s success.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608572404{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564543132598{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

The analytical shopper

This type of website visitor already has a service or a product in mind. They usually take their time to research about what they need and compare multiple options. They analyse their options vigilantly. They base their decisions in the near future on whether to buy the product or not and who to buy it from, based on their analysis. This is why highlighting on your e-commerce website design what separates you from the rest of the competition, or your value proposition, is essential. Lay out exactly what your customers will be getting from you, and don’t forget to leave your contact details if they have questions about the products or services from your Malvern business.

Confetti Design understands the natural browsing flow of these customers, and our strategic design emphasises the areas we want them to focus on. We create your amazing story told through your website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1563608578524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564493792098{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Rivals

It is a good practise among businesses to check on their competition or competitions from time to time. This helps businesses to stay sharp and competitive, and it is good for the consumers too as prices will be at the fair level. When you create a professional website for your business in Malvern or anywhere in Melbourne, some of your regular website visitors are rival businesses. So, what do we do about it? Absolutely nothing. Remember that when we conceal information because we’re afraid that our competitors might see, like our pricing for our products, you are also hiding the information from your potential customers. One of the two things can happen—either they hide their information from their website, which makes your website more trustworthy than theirs, or they imitate your professional web design, which gives you the competitive advantage.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563761704777{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563761697603{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564542997088{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Malvern, Sandringham, Beaumaris, and nearby areas. Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563761683337{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
